name: Faerie Queen
description: The eternal ruler of the Fae Court, wielding devastating illusion magic and commanding the loyalty of all fairy-kind. Her presence inspires allies and terrifies enemies.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Mesmerizes an enemy unit, causing it to temporarily fight for the Faerie Queen.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Creates illusions of the Faerie Queen that deal reduced damage but confuse enemies.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.description: Burns mana from an enemy unit, dealing damage equal to the mana burned.

abilities.name: Vengeance
abilities.description: Ultimate: Summons a powerful spirit of vengeance that attacks enemies. When the Faerie Queen dies while vengeance is active, she is reborn through the spirit.

texts: Such is the fate of those who defy me.
